description: While slightly shorter than the 9” Women’s Bridger Insulated boot, this boot has all the same features that make it a great winter option for snowshoeing and other winter activities. With 200 gram Freeze Guard Insulation, you won’t overheat during high intensity activities or be cold in more casual outdoor pursuits.
name: Bridger 7" Insulated B-Dry, Wide - Womens

specs.value: Waterproof Nubuck Leather, Suede Leather, B-Dry Waterproof Membrane, Fleece lining, Molded rubber toe cap & heel kick, Gaiter D-Ring
Length runs true to size. Generous volume for thicker socks
